C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: etcd-client
command:
etcdctl member list -w table
if etcdctl user get root &>/dev/null; then
  echo "User already exists, nothing to do"
else
  etcdctl user add --no-password=true root &&
  etcdctl role add root &&
  etcdctl user grant-role root root &&
  etcdctl auth enable
fi

containers.name: kubectl
args:
if kubectl get secret etcd-certs --namespace=default &>/dev/null; then
  echo "Secret etcd-certs already exists"
else
  echo "Creating secret etcd-certs"
  kubectl --namespace=default create secret generic etcd-certs --from-file=/certs/ca.crt --from-file=/certs/ca.key --from-file=/certs/peer-key.pem --from-file=/certs/peer.pem --from-file=/certs/server-key.pem --from-file=/certs/server.pem
fi
if kubectl get secret root-client-certs --namespace=default &>/dev/null; then
  echo "Secret root-client-certs already exists"
else
  echo "Creating secret root-client-certs"
  kubectl --namespace=default create secret tls root-client-certs --key=/certs/root-client-key.pem --cert=/certs/root-client.pem
fi

command:
cfssl gencert -initca /csr/ca-csr.json | cfssljson -bare /certs/ca &&
mv /certs/ca.pem /certs/ca.crt && mv /certs/ca-key.pem /certs/ca.key &&
cfssl gencert -ca=/certs/ca.crt -ca-key=/certs/ca.key -config=/csr/config.json -profile=peer-authentication /csr/peer-csr.json | cfssljson -bare /certs/peer &&
cfssl gencert -ca=/certs/ca.crt -ca-key=/certs/ca.key -config=/csr/config.json -profile=peer-authentication /csr/server-csr.json | cfssljson -bare /certs/server &&
cfssl gencert -ca=/certs/ca.crt -ca-key=/certs/ca.key -config=/csr/config.json -profile=client-authentication /csr/root-client-csr.json | cfssljson -bare /certs/root-client
initContainers.name: cfssl
